为各选项设置额外内容。.en-us: Set extra content for each option.

按钮模式下设置额外的图标元素。.en-us: Set extra icon elements in button mode.

设置参数`buttonMode=True`后触发点显示为按钮样式。.en-us: Set the parameter `buttonMode=True` to trigger point displays as button styles.

按钮模式时自定义按钮的样式。.en-us: Custom button style in button mode.

自由位置模式的最典型应用场景是配合`fuc.FefferyDiv`的右键事件监听.en-us: The typical scenario of the free position mode is to listen to the right click event of the `fuc.FefferyDiv` to trigger the custom right-click menu in the area of interest.

设置参数`trigger='click'`后通过点击才可触发下拉菜单。.en-us: Set the parameter `trigger='click'` to trigger the dropdown menu by clicking.

设置参数`arrow=True`为展开的下拉菜单渲染连接箭头。.en-us: Set the parameter `arrow=True` to render the connection arrow in the expanded dropdown menu.

设置参数`placement`控制下拉菜单的展开方向。.en-us: Set the parameter `placement` to control the direction of the dropdown menu.

设置参数`children`自定义下拉菜单锚点元素，支持单个或多个组件。.en-us: Set the parameter `children` to customize the dropdown menu anchor element, which supports single or multiple components.

设置参数`selectable=True`开启菜单选择能力，默认为单选模式，当额.en-us: Set the parameter `selectable=True` to enable the menu selection capability. The default is single selection mode. When the parameter `multiple=True` is set, it can enable multiple selection mode.

通过`nClicks`、`clickedKey`进行下拉菜单项点击事件的监听。.en-us: Listen to the click event of the dropdown menu items through `nClicks` and `clickedKey`.
